{{Infobox American_State_Political_Party | party_name = Michigan Democratic Party | party_article = Democratic Party (United States) | chairman = [[Mark Brewer (Michigan Democrat)|Mark Brewer]] | senateleader = [[Gretchen Whitmer]] | houseleader = [[Richard Hammel]] | foundation = | colors = [[Blue]] | ideology = [[American liberalism|American Liberalism]]
[[Progressivism in the United States|Progressivism]] | position = [[Center-left]] | national = [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democratic Party]] | headquarters = 606 Townsend St., Lansing, MI 48933 | website = [http://www.michigandems.com//index.html MDP] | footnotes = }} The '''Michigan Democratic Party''' is the state-level party of the [[United States Democratic Party]] in [[Michigan]]. It is based in [[Lansing, Michigan|Lansing]]. [[Mark Brewer (Michigan Democrat)|Mark Brewer]] is the current Party Chair. ==Current officeholders== The Michigan Democratic Party controls none of the four statewide offices and holds a minority of seats in the Michigan House of Representatives and Michigan Senate. They hold both of Michigan's U.S. Senate seats, six of the state's 15 U.S. House seats, and majorities on the State Board of Education and the elected governing boards of the [[University of Michigan]], [[Michigan State University]], and [[Wayne State University]]. ===Members of Congress=== ====[[U.S. Senate]]==== *[[Carl Levin]] *[[Debbie Stabenow]] ====[[U.S. House of Representatives]]==== *[[Dale Kildee]], [[Michigan's 5th congressional district|5th District]] *[[Gary Peters (Michigan politician)|Gary Peters]], [[Michigan's 9th congressional district|9th District]] *[[Sander Levin]], [[Michigan's 12th congressional district|12th District]] *[[Hansen Clarke]], [[Michigan's 13th congressional district|13th District]] *[[John Conyers]], [[Michigan's 14th congressional district|14th District]] *[[John Dingell]], [[Michigan's 15th congressional district|15th District]] ===Statewide offices=== *None ===State Legislature=== *The [[Michigan Senate]] has a Democratic Minority of 12 seats with [[Gretchen Whitmer]] currently serving as Democratic Senate Leader *The [[Michigan House of Representatives|Michigan House]] has a Democratic Minority of 47 seats with [[Richard Hammel]] currently serving as Democratic House Leader ==See also== *[[Political party strength in Michigan]] ==External links== *[http://www.michigandems.com/ Michigan Democratic Party Official Web site] *[http://www.michigandems.com/getlocal.html County Parties] *[http://www.mi-youngdems.yda.org/ Michigan Young Democrats] *[http://www.senatedems.org/ Michigan Senate Democrats] *[http://www.housedems.com Michigan House Democrats] {{US-party-stub}} {{MichiganPoliticalParties}} {{U.S. Democratic Party state parties}} [[Category:Politics of Michigan|Democratic Party]] [[Category:Democratic Party (United States) by state]]
